title: Malaysia to take legal action against X over misuse of Grok chatbot

title: Meta mulls doubling output of Ray-Ban glasses by year end, Bloomberg News reports
description: Meta and EssilorLuxottica are considering doubling the production capacity of their artificial intelligence-powered smart glasses to 20 million units annually by the end of this year, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.
content:
The potential increase, driven by strong demand, could also see capacity exceed 30 million units if market conditions warrant, the report said, citing people familiar with the matter. No decision has been finalized though, it added.

title: Hegseth to partner with Musk's Grok AI
description: War Secretary Pete Hegseth announced Monday that the Pentagon will be extending its artificial intelligence network with the addition of Elon Musk’s Grok.
content:
During the stop on the Arsenal of Freedom Tour, Hegseth said Grok will collaborate with Google’s generative AI engine in operating within the Pentagon’s infrastructure.

title: Nvidia, Eli Lilly Launch $1 Billion AI Lab To Build Meds
description: NVIDIA and Eli Lilly launch a $1 billion AI lab to speed drug discovery, improve manufacturing, and apply artificial intelligence across research, clinical trials, and supply chains over the next five years.
content:
Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) and Eli Lilly and Co (NYSE:LLY) are launching a lab designed to apply advanced artificial intelligence to drug development.
